title: @Riot, please help
body:
My friend Soltis was just permabanned and I am asking, as someone that can vouch for the good heartedness of this person, for my friend's account be restored.

Mind you, I have never person in real life, but heck, this guy was even politly asking our qued team  to refrain from vulgar profanitis over the microphone, as they have children. The others' response was rude and brash, but he kept his cool despite frustrating situations.

Riot, please, from the bottom of your heart, restore my friends' permaban. They are a nice, honorable person who doesn't deserve a permaban. Thank you.

replies.body: If he keeps his cool, why is he permabanned?

If they were perma banned then they have been punished in the past and continued to not show reform. If you think that the punishment was in error the only thing that they can do is submit a support ticket.

Was the permaban due to toxicity? If So, riot will not unban the account. If it was for unknown reasons, he may be able to contest it. 

If you are still in touch with him, see if you can get more details from him.

Long story short, the team was being disrespectful to my friend, he did cuss them out, which is very I unlike the Soltis I've been playing with regularly the past few months.

He obviously got banned for cussing them out. All I'm saying is that it's a shame that one of the least toxic people on my friends list has been permabanned, out of the blue, and am asking a chance for my forsaken friend {{champion:2}} to have one chance to have his account back.
It's extremely unlikely he's been permabanned for just one game - either he has a previous history or he really went above and beyond with his toxicity.

But he just Uninstalled and I can't find him on Facebook, so.. I guess there's nothing more to do.

 I feel really bad for my friend, I'm way more toxic than he is, :/

Sorry to hear that. At least he had someone fighting for him :)

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Yup, and I'm sure the people who were being toxic to him are still playing the game. Riot has a shit reporting system.

Lol I wonder why he got permabanned... the fact he did, leads me to believe he's a huge hypocrite who only selfishly protects his children, while insulting other children. But I don't know the full story, so I'll hold off on the judgement xD
Perma means it's gone forever there is no way a player can ever get the accounts back. Sorry for dat guy.
